column4: is there some particular reason why this ubuntu installer is telling me i need 4.4 gb of hard disk space when the boot disk is only something like 600mb
because this is an old asus netbook and it only has 2 gb of hdd
and the deb packages expand to bigger than 600Mb when uncompressed
what's on the CDROM is a single compressed filesystem, and the contents (usually) gets copied over uncompressed.
